Detailed Description

This class group the data about a parsed message.

Similar to Message (in part Com) but it is used with XML Message, and stored the message as a XML tree. The XML tree is based on the structure given by the library XML 2.

Author:
Sebastien Pesnel

Definition at line 35 of file XMLTreeParser.h.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

XMLMessage::XMLMessage ( const XMLMessage &  msg  ) 

Copy Constructor.

The message as XML tree is not copied. Only the pointer on the structure is copied. Before deleting these object, set one of the two doc attribute to NULL, in order to not free two times the same data.

Parameters:
msg [in] the message to copy
